name: thunder-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
